mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.apply_id AS "applyId", a.contract_id as "contract.id", c.name as "contract.name", c.code as "contract.code", c.value as "contract.value", c.income as "contract.income", a.status AS "status", a.value AS "value", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", c.office_id as "contract.office.id"
left join sys_user u on u.id=a.create_by left join bm_contract c on c.id=a.contract_id
mapper.select:

a.apply_id=#{_parameter}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bm_income( id, apply_id, status, value, create_by, create_date, proc_ins_id, contract_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applyId}, #{status}, #{value}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{procInsId}, #{contract.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bm_income SET apply_id = #{applyId}, status = #{status}, value = #{value}, proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, contract_id = #{contract.id} WHERE id = #{id}
